General.Name: Thai Group Holdings Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thai Group Holdings Public Company Limited operates insurance and finance business in Thailand. It operates through Life Insurance Business, Non-life Insurance Business, Financial Service Business, and Others Businesses segments. The company provides underwriting life assurance, underwriting non-life insurance, leasing, hire purchase services, lending, and sales of second hand cars. In addition, it engages in the rental and development of real estate, leasing of second hand cars, and development of insurance technology; operates lending fund company and outsources surveyors; and offers management, consultant, and training services, as well as telephone customer services. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
